ML Inference Pipeline

The Prediction Module enables users to run inference on preprocessed and normalized datasets. This is powered by trained machine learning models that support both batch and real-time predictions.

  • Built-in machine learning model support
  • Run real-time and batch inference
  • Save and visualize prediction results
  • Monitor model performance over time
  • Flexible integration with normalized outputs

For best results, ensure the data is validated and normalized before prediction.
